name: unrestful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not calm and relaxed, or not making you feel calm and relaxed: The body and mind are both in an unrestful state, which affects everyone present. The condition can cause insomnia, unrestful sleep, and daytime sleepiness. This tension makes for an unrestful environment. Compare
restful
More examplesFewer examplesThe presence of chronic stress causes the body to feel on-edge in an unrestful state.Unrestful sleep could be result of untreated breathing difficulties. Increasingly, research is pointing to the negative impact of an unrestful environment on a worker's sense of well-being.
